history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER Shady Side Avenue
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to east end veterinary medical centre?
USER No.
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER Shady Avenue
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to shady avenue?
USER Yes.
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER Ellsworth Ave
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from ellsworth avenue?
USER Yes.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER the night at 10
TTS Okay, travelling at 11:09 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 12 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Negley avenue at Ellsworth avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER I'm leaving tonight at 11:30.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER milk
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Negley avenue at Ellsworth avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Negley avenue at Ellsworth avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
